-- Signal Repeater: Fire signal 10 times with 250ms pause between each
-- Works with: Fireworks, Manual Switches, Doors, Lights, or any element with fire() or activate()

_G.repeatCount = 0
_G.maxRepeats = 10
_G.signalDelay = 0.25  -- 250ms in seconds

system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))
system.print("Signal Repeater Started")
system.print("Connected element: slot1")
system.print("Will fire " .. _G.maxRepeats .. " times with " .. (_G.signalDelay * 1000) .. "ms pause")
system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))

-- Fire first signal
if slot1.fire then
    slot1.fire()
elseif slot1.activate then
    slot1.activate()
else
    system.print("ERROR: slot1 doesn't support fire() or activate()")
    unit.exit()
end

_G.repeatCount = 1
system.print("[" .. _G.repeatCount .. "/" .. _G.maxRepeats .. "] FIRED")

-- Schedule next fire
if _G.repeatCount < _G.maxRepeats then
    unit.setTimer("fire_next", _G.signalDelay)
else
    system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))
    system.print("ALL SIGNALS COMPLETE!")
    system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))
end

-- Timer handler: fires next signal

if timerId == "fire_next" then
    -- Fire the signal
    if slot1.fire then
        slot1.fire()
    elseif slot1.activate then
        slot1.activate()
    end
    
    _G.repeatCount = _G.repeatCount + 1
    system.print("[" .. _G.repeatCount .. "/" .. _G.maxRepeats .. "] FIRED")
    
    -- Schedule next fire if not done
    if _G.repeatCount < _G.maxRepeats then
        unit.setTimer("fire_next", _G.signalDelay)
    else
        unit.stopTimer("fire_next")
        system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))
        system.print("ALL SIGNALS COMPLETE!")
        system.print("=" .. string.rep("=", 40))
    end
end
